Title: 41977 - # Things to Invest In If You Want to Get Into Photography
Direction: 675 words. Write about four to eight different items that someone should invest in if they want to get into photography. You can talk about things like memory storage, editing software, external flashes and lighting, backdrops, tripods, etc. Your target audience is interested in technology, so make sure that you mention the specs of the gadgets you suggest. You should talk about purchasing a new digital camera in one section, to incorporate the client link. Try to naturally link to non-competitor products throughout the article to make the Sony link less obvious.
Extra Writer Notes: Example AT: one of the best digital cameras from Sony
